meanings.sent1: The enzymic reaction in the lab was fascinating to watch.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained the enzymic process in a simple way.
meanings.sent3: The chef's enzymic skills in the kitchen were unmatched.
meanings.sent4: Her enzymic ability to solve problems quickly impressed everyone.
meanings.sent5: The enzymic nature of the solution made it work effectively.

meanings.definition: Having the properties of an enzyme.
meanings.sent1: The enzymic cleaner easily broke down the tough stains.
meanings.sent2: The plant's enzymic reaction helped it thrive in harsh conditions.
meanings.sent3: The enzymic power of the superhero's suit amazed everyone.
meanings.sent4: His enzymic speed on the track was unmatched by his competitors.
meanings.sent5: The enzymic properties of the new medicine made it highly effective.
